subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur held the Tampa Bay Lightning scoreless for 51 minutes, David Clarkson had a goal and an assist, and the visiting Devils hung on for a 4-2 victory Saturday night.
snippet: Martin Brodeur held the Tampa Bay Lightning scoreless for 51 minutes, David Clarkson had a goal and an assist, and the visiting Devils hung on for a 4-2 victory Saturday night.
